title: Beat Blader 3D: EDM Music Race
summary: Neon-styled rhythm runner where players slash music cubes to the beat.
description:
Beat Blader 3D is a neon-styled rhythm runner where players control a blade to slash incoming music cubes to the beat, dodge obstacles, and progress through energetic EDM tracks.

The experience combines simple swipe controls with satisfying visual feedback, song-driven pacing, and progression systems that keep the run-to-run gameplay engaging.
responsibilities: Implemented and polished gameplay and UI features for the rhythm-runner loop (input, timing feedback, score/combo presentation, menus).
Built reusable UI components and configuration-driven content hooks to support live updates and faster iteration.
Optimized performance and stability on mid/low-end devices (rendering, memory, asset loading), and helped reduce UI-related hitches during gameplay.
Collaborated with designers, QA, and backend/product stakeholders to validate edge cases, ship updates safely, and maintain live operations quality.
